dialogueLines.line: Ha, that was fun! Speaking of which, what's your favor?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I want you to eat a man and kill him!
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Isn't that too much to ask!?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: No, I said I'd do you one favor, but come on man. I don't want to eat people unnecessarily either.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: No, this is important to you too!
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Well, given the phenomenon of rap battles bringing back memories, I'm thinking that you might be able to get them all back at once by eating the brains of a professional rapper.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Oh, so that guy you want me to kill, you don't think...?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Yeah, that's right. I'm a little offended to call him a pro, though.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: It's a couple of kids, a man and a woman, and the man is the professional rapper. So you go find that duo and eat the male one.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Don't ever mess with the female one. They have very dignified faces like mine, so you should be able to recognize them by their faces.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Ok! I guess I should just eat the boy one of the duo! See you later, thanks man!!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: That girl...she left without even saying her own name.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: I think I've seen her face somewhere... but I must be imagining it
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
